column1: To use Stripe, please install the library stripe/stripe-php since it is required for proper Stripe functioning. Read this article for more info.
column2: To use Stripe, please install the library stripe/stripe-php since it is required for proper Stripe functioning. Read this article for more info.

column1: Enable this if you want to save customer cards on Stripe's servers so that they don't have to enter the details of the same card twice.
column2: Enable this if you want to save customer cards on Stripe's servers so that they don't have to enter the details of the same card twice.

column1: Make 3D Secure Authentication Mandatory for All Cards That Support It

column1: If yes, Stripe will send email receipts for successful payments and refunds but only in Live mode.
